Posts.Content: Hi all..... Any of you had triple negative breast cancer? What type of tests does tour doctor orders after finishing all treatments? Do you have any annually PET CT or MRI? My mum's follow up is coming and she'e between choosing an annually PET CT or MRI and she doesn't know.... Does your oncologists order PET CT annually?   Thank you all...
Posts.Title: FOLLOW UP TESTS

Posts.Content: Hi Sue G, Did you had full axillary lymph nodes dissection? My mum had a lumpectomy and full axillary dissection, followed by dose dense chemo and she just finished radiation therapy.She has a lot of pain in her arm and she can't move it properly.Did you had the same experience when you finished radiation? The other thing i want to ask you is what kind of tets did you had for follow up? Did you had any CT Scans when you just finished and tumor markers?   All the best!
Posts.Title: bc with alot underarm lymph node involvement

Posts.Content: Hi Teggielass, how are you?   Did you had radiation therapy under the arm? My mum has just finished radiation therapy and has a lot of pain in the arm. What are you doing for a special care for your arm? I'm trying to find a specialised hospital in UK for breast cancer, what hospital are you going? Did you had your first follow up tests, and if yes what tests did you had?(CT Scans, tumor markers, etc). All the best to you!
Posts.Title: bc with alot underarm lymph node involvement

Posts.Content: Hi Maggs,   How many lymph nodes were affected by cancer and how big it was the tumor in breast? Did you received any hormon therapy? My mum was diagnosed with a 2 cm tumour in breast and 7 lymph nodes affected by cancer in axillary area.Did you take any chemo treatment?   All the best to you
Posts.Title: bc with alot underarm lymph node involvement

Posts.Content: Does any of you have triple negative breast cancer and what tests are you having after treatment for follow up?   All the best to you all
